entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Pickle Lake

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
